**User-specified**
<p align="justify">
Alternatively, the user may upload a CSV file of occurrence data to use in the analysis, such as processed files previously downloaded via Wallace. Such a file must contain rows of localities, and the first three columns should be “species”, “longitude”, and “latitude” (in that order, with those names).  
</p>
